title: PRD ReDesign: Shipping Page

background.description: The Shipping Page is a key informational page designed to provide users with clear, transparent details about DoktorABC's delivery methods, timelines, packaging, and policies.
user_types: Pre-order users: researching delivery options before making a purchase
Post-order users: looking for details about their shipment, expected delivery times, or carrier information
background.traffic_source: Most traffic comes via the footer or the tab in the navbar (CMS pages)
background.goal: Improve transparency, trust, and conversion by clearly presenting all shipping options and reinforcing DoktorABC's professionalism and discretion

target_audience: Users navigate from the nav bar, footer, or menu tab to learn about delivery
Users with questions or concerns about shipping before or after purchase
Users who encountered delivery-related issues or want to verify providers, timelines, or packaging discretion
page_purpose: To give users a complete, transparent, and trustworthy overview of DoktorABC's shipping methods including: Delivery types and timelines, Availability and restrictions, Privacy and packaging standards, Contact guidance for support
success_indicators: Increase conversion rate from users who view the shipping page → paid order
Reduce % of customer service tickets related to pre-order shipping questions

requirements: Standard DoktorABC navbar
design_sections.notes: Same structure as homepage and category pages

requirements: Title: 'Fast. Discreet. Reliable: Your shipping with DoktorABC'
Subtitle: 'We deliver your medicine as quickly as possible - in neutral packaging, with the utmost privacy and complete confidence. Your health deserves nothing less.'
Must include a relevant hero image (delivery or neutral packaging theme)

Include the following USPs: > 90% of all orders are shipped within 24 hours, Express delivery in 2 hours is available in selected locations, Neutral packaging with no externally visible indication of the contents, Free delivery with all options (where applicable), Shipment tracking included - stay informed at all times, Delivery on working days (Monday - Friday)
design_sections.notes: The hero section must be visually clear, premium, and trustworthy. It should reflect discretion, speed, and professionalism

requirements: Main title: 'Your shipping methods at a glance'
Subtitle: 'Choose the shipping option that best suits your needs, depending on urgency, location, or pickup preference. All options are secure, discreet, and professionally organized.'
Three Option Cards: a) 2-hour express delivery (Uber/courier), b) DHL - 24-48h delivery, c) Pickup - Pick up at the pharmacy
design_sections.notes: Each shipping option must be presented as an individual card with clear icons and visual differentiation. The section should appear structured, easy to scan, and mobile-friendly

requirements: Heading: 'Our neutral packaging: Why, how, what?'
Paragraph explaining privacy priority
Sub-heading: 'What does 'neutral packaging' mean?'

Bullet points: No logos or references to medical contents on the outside, Outer shell looks like any standard shipping box, Inside you will find your medication carefully packaged, Packaging is designed to avoid insights, Discreet shipping notification
Sub-heading: 'Why do we do this?'
Paragraph explaining discretion importance
design_sections.notes: Design should visually emphasize discretion. Use muted colors, clean layout, and iconography of packaging and privacy

design_sections.section: How It Works - Step by Step Section
requirements: Heading: 'How your shipping works with DoktorABC'
Numbered steps: 1) Online questionnaire & consultation, 2) Prescription issuance, 3) Choose shipping option, 4) Discreet delivery or pickup, 5) Acceptance & Use
design_sections.notes: Present steps in a horizontal timeline or numbered column layout with icons for each step

requirements: Heading: 'Frequently asked questions about shipping'
6 FAQs covering: 2-hour delivery regions, Free shipping, Tracking, Not home scenarios, Privacy guarantee, Pickup options
design_sections.notes: FAQs should appear in collapsible accordion format with icons for each question. Maintain consistent FAQ design as homepage

requirements: Heading: 'Ready for your treatment?'
Paragraph encouraging consultation start
Button: 'Start consultation now'
Category navigation buttons (same as on homepage)
design_sections.notes: CTA must be strong and visible, styled like homepage buttons

requirements: Add our payment method logo strip
Small print paragraph: Note about shipping commencement, delivery on weekends/public holidays, availability of 2-hour delivery
design_sections.notes: Must appear at bottom of the page before footer. Simple, readable text format
